title: Time travels faster on Mars than on Earth, and here's why
description: Measuring the time discrepancy between Earth and Mars will help make future navigation and communication systems on the Red Planet more accurate.
content: Measuring the time discrepancy between Earth and Mars will help make future navigation and communication systems on the Red Planet more accurate.
